name: Silence Devours You
description:
History:

You have signed a contract under which have to go to the island to do your job. Day after day you are obliged to fulfill it, under no circumstances do not deviate from the task plan.

Gameplay:

This is a roving game, you have a list of tasks that you have to do by the end of the day.

Note:

In the web version of the game, the custom cursor is disabled, but in the downloadable version of the game, there is a custom cursor.
